entry.title: Tuesday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 11.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 11. Wind chill minus 8 this evening. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Tuesday 07 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Sunny. High zero.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind becoming southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 near noon. High zero. Wind chill minus 14 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Tuesday 07 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 7.
